website_summaries.verdict: One of the best-tasting pulling oils that's ideal for those new to those new to oil pulling.
pros: Customers feel this oil is easy to use and most liked the light, pleasant taste of coconut and mint
Many remark on the how clean feeling it left their mouths and made repeat purchases
Some note it improves stains and helps with dry mouth
cons: Tends to separate in cooler temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things
customer_reviews.text: I've recently had dental work done and it has left me with some new problems. I had a little of this mouthwash left from before and starting using it again and along with whitening my teeth it has really helped with the sensitivity and the gums around a crown that has given me grief from the beginning. Nobody likes a pain in their mouth. I love this product;)
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Too much trouble!
customer_reviews.text: It might work I don't know but what I know is you have to mix it with warm water to make it work and I don't have time to make a product work if I did I would make my own to begin with. I just don't have time for that. It's coconut oil and mouth wash and you have to add water. Thats ridiculous! If you have time to make your own mouth wash go for it I don't!
customer_reviews.author: Pinky Lew

customer_reviews.title: Teeth whitening & dry mouth
customer_reviews.text: Mainly ordered this product for help with dry mouth. I do notice that my teeth seem to be a little whiter, but I have only been using it for a week. My mouth is really dry so I believe the mint flavoring tends to sting for a few minutes then dissipates. I'm going to keep using this product because my mouth does feel better after I rinse with it. I have a hard time using it 3 times a day but do use it at least twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard great things about coconut oil mouth wash and figured I’d try it. I keep mine in the shower and swish while I shampoo. It keeps it liquid with the shower warmth. The taste is good and I definitely feel and see a difference. I’m going to use it for a few weeks and see if my dentist notices the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Nice flavor. I think it’s a little bit expensive for the size and amount of coconut oil. I will recommended to try Extra Virgin Coconut Oil. For 10 bucks you can get 16 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Andra

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, came in all chunky gross had to returned never opened the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Bonenfant

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have had some oral health issues and this was so helpful, I plan to start using it on a regular basis. I did think my teeth looked a little bit whiter - uh, less yellow - but am not sure I have been using it long enough to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H. Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Not a fix
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really help my teeth or gums but wasn’t gross tasting which was a plus
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Freels

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, and my dentist approves of this. Product arrived sooner, then expected, and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Listerine in small bottle
customer_reviews.text: Just tried it - either it is a counterfeit or fake product all together. It is nothing but Listerine in a bottle. Just use real coconut oil, I got mine from Costco, much more cost effective and you do get a real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not swallow it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this. I love it! Although, the last time I received it, the cap was cracked and most of it leaked into the box. Amazon gave me credit, but I was disappointed I had no product. It works well though! Worth the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s the right product for teeth whitening and oral cleanliness
customer_reviews.text: The product is one of the best teeth whitening material I have ever used. People started seeing the changes just after few weeks of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Alhagie Bubacarr Gaye

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it does it all. I whitens, freshens and strengthens my teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helping with my dry mouth
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few days and it is already helping with my dry mouth. My morning breathe hasn't been as bad since using this. I will definitely continue to order this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner than clean!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product! I actually have the flu and this product is the only product that took my sickly mouth to squeaky clean in seconds, thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this mouth wash before I went to bed and when I woke up my breathe was still fresh
customer_reviews.author: demor orr

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a product that works for severe dry mouth and teeth protection
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Only thing that worked for my dry mouth, bad breath , and helps with getting cavities. It also whitens your teeth naturally!
customer_reviews.author: Christine H.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I felt like I could tell the difference in days
customer_reviews.author: michael a. frangipane

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for Whitening Teeth!
customer_reviews.text: The coconut oil solution really does the trick. If you are budget minded and in search of teeth whitening products, THIS IS IT! Forget the expensive toothpastes, teeth trays with lights, or strips. This is the lowest price teeth whitening agent that works for your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: rod

customer_reviews.title: I got what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I got what I expected and it really has been helping with my gum health
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love This Product
customer_reviews.text: works very well, i use it twice a day, already can see results
customer_reviews.author: Vadim Iskhakov

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and will be buying it again
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Detox your mouth
customer_reviews.text: Strong for your gums and teeth . Very effective . Use it on a daily and see results !
customer_reviews.author: Celio Melendez

customer_reviews.title: I like it - I'm new to this type of product ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it - I'm new to this type of product so am still testing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burns my mouth
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy with this product. I thought it would be soothing and refreshing but it burns my mouth and tastes like Listerine. I never liked Listerine, so I’m struggling to use it. It will never whiten my teeth because it’s too uncomfortable to use it the number and length of time recommended. I wouldn’t mind sending it back for a refund with free shipping. So that’s how I feel about it. I am disappointed. I have dry mouth from blood pressure meds. So I love coconut oil and thought this would be great. But sadly , not so.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Work!
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy! The coconut oil and solution take forever to come together. If you live in a cold climate forget about it, you best be git'in' out the blow torch. The instruction says to soak the bottle in warm water, that's not happening, hot water will do the trick, be sure you're taking a shower while it's simmering.
customer_reviews.author: The McDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Really Helps
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for just about two years now and I can’t express what a great choice it is! Yes you have to put it in a cup of hot water (I generally put it in the water brush my teeth by the time I’m done it’s ready) but I’d say my breath is better, my teeth look whiter, and my mouth just feels clean.
customer_reviews.author: taunahopkins

customer_reviews.title: Making me return damaged product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product, but the cap was broken & contents spilled everywhere. They are sending a replacement but making me send back the completely damaged bottle?!?! It’s not possible
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Quisenberrymequisenberry

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I had bleeding gums when I brushed my teeth. I flossed daily but within a week of using this product, my gums stopped bleeding. Dislike: out of stock when I tried to get some more.
customer_reviews.author: Datrick Williams

customer_reviews.title: The coconut oil may separate and solidify.
customer_reviews.text: The coconut oil separated from the other ingredients and solidified making it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tyler

customer_reviews.title: It takes time to use.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little difficult to mix. It takes a few minutes to mix and then use. It makes it hard to be consistent in using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using sesame oil but this taste so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Kelly

product_meta.title: Oil Pulling Coconut Oil Mouthwash for Dry Mouth & Bad Breath - Excellent Remedy for Dry Mouth & Tooth Whitening - Resolves Bad Breath - Risk Free Guarantee
product_meta.description:
Ayurveda Oil Pulling Coconut Oil & Tooth Whitening

Coconut Oil Swish is made in the United States and shipped fast directly by Amazon.

High Quality Virgin Coconut Oil 

You will notice Coconut Oil Swish is solid at room temperature just like organic virgin coconut oil. We take pride in using the highest quality ingredients.

PROVEN TEETH WHITENER 

Coconut Oil Swish, through extensive research has found the perfect blend that will help whiten teeth and destroy bad breath. 

GREAT FOR OIL PULLING

This oral rinse is perfect for teeth whitening and oil pulling. Virgin coconut oil is great for skin and complete oral care. 

GET FRESH BREATH AND WHITE TEETH NOW!

Nothing works faster and last longer to leave you with a refreshing mouth and whiter teeth.
feature_bullets: Ayurveda Oil Pulling Coconut Oil: Virgin Coconut Oil Swish is an oral oil pulling solution that works instantly to stop bad breath and dry mouth. ► This product is Excellent to Whiten your teeth and remove years of coffee and tea stains from you teeth
Tooth Whitening & Benefits of Coconut Oil Pulling: Releives Dry Mouth & Removes years of teeth stains causedd by tea, coffee, and smoking for a whiter smile

Bad Breath Remedy : We have added natural menthol mint that give this oral swish a delicious flavor ► PROUDLY MADE IN USA - Lauren Natural Products Formulated and Bottled in Georgia. ★ Made in USA and Never Tested On Animals - Cruelty Free

► HIGHEST QUALITY INGREDIENTS - Made out of Premier Coconut Oil. Formulated with only the highest quality natural & organic ingredients. Very effective as a fresh breath oral rinse. Coconut oil is great for skin and oral oil pulling.

★ BUY NOW and get FAST shipping & 100% Money Back Guarantee. If you don't absolutely love the results you get, return it for a full refund. Even if the bottle is empty ►NO RISK TO YOU. You have nothing to lose.
